Name: AURA OF PURITY
Description: Purifying energy radiates from you inan aura with a30-foot radius. Until the spell ends, the aura moveswith you, centered onyou. Each nonhostile creaturein the aura (including you)can't become diseased,has resistance to poison damage, and has advantageon saving throws against effects that cause any ofthefollowing conditions: blinded, charmed, deafened,frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, and stunned.
